name: part_008
file: tmp_【#ノエル生誕はっぴーLIVE】今日は誕生日！！好きなことしてはっぴーになろおおお✨【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [E1HXg-kjOI8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Noel and her guests continue performing 'Daily Diary'.
A brief transition as the first performance concludes.
MC segment where Noel talks with her guests and takes photos with the mascots.
Noel performs a cover of 'Tori no Uta'.

subtitles.original: でいり〜だいあり〜！
subtitles.english: Daily Diary!

subtitles.original: 特別すごいことなんてそう起こらないリアル
subtitles.english: Reality is that nothing particularly amazing really happens

subtitles.original: だけどそのエッセンスがその世界 夢に変えて
subtitles.english: But that essence turns that world into a dream

subtitles.original: 毎日がパラダイス
subtitles.english: Every day is a paradise

subtitles.original: 思い切り遊んで笑っちゃおう
subtitles.english: Let's play and laugh to our hearts' content

subtitles.original: ノエル！
subtitles.english: Noel!

subtitles.original: お誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: 4回目祝えて嬉しいよ
subtitles.english: I'm so happy to celebrate for the fourth time

subtitles.original: 今年も後わずかになったね
subtitles.english: There's only a little bit left of this year, isn't there?

subtitles.original: 今年も大変お世話になりました
subtitles.english: Thank you for all your help this year

subtitles.original: 来年もよろしく！
subtitles.english: I'm looking forward to next year too!

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って。年越しムーブなんだけど。
subtitles.english: Wait a minute. This is totally a New Year's Eve vibe.

subtitles.original: どんな毎日も 楽しくなっちゃうんだ
subtitles.english: No matter what kind of day it is, it becomes fun

subtitles.original: だっていつだって ほらあなたが待ってるの
subtitles.english: Because look, you're always waiting

subtitles.original: みんなで毎日を 出会えた嬉しい日を
subtitles.english: Together every day, these happy days we met

subtitles.original: みんなと一緒に気分はね もう最高潮
subtitles.english: When I'm with everyone, I feel like I'm at the peak

subtitles.original: 窓の向こうの笑顔に手を振って
subtitles.english: Waving to the smiles beyond the window

subtitles.original: 配信で届ける「あわでいり〜だいあり〜」
subtitles.english: Delivering our daily diary through streaming

subtitles.original: 青春実況中
subtitles.english: Streaming our youth

subtitles.original: 挑戦配信中
subtitles.english: Broadcasting our challenges

subtitles.original: 青春実況中
subtitles.english: Streaming our youth

subtitles.original: 挑戦配信中
subtitles.english: Broadcasting our challenges

subtitles.original: でいり〜だいあり〜 届けよう
subtitles.english: Let's deliver our daily diary

subtitles.original: ノエル！
subtitles.english: Noel!

subtitles.original: お誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: あー！ ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Ah! Thank you!

subtitles.original: 4回目祝えて嬉しいよ。
subtitles.english: I'm so happy to celebrate for the fourth time.

subtitles.original: 今年も後わずかになったね。
subtitles.english: There's only a little bit left of this year.

subtitles.original: 今年も大変お世話になりました。
subtitles.english: Thank you for everything this year.

subtitles.original: 来年もよろしく。
subtitles.english: Looking forward to next year too.

subtitles.original: え、ちょっと待って！
subtitles.english: Wait, wait a minute!

subtitles.original: え、何？ 何これ？
subtitles.english: What? What's this?

subtitles.original: いや、それ2回目だし、ちょっと待って！
subtitles.english: No, that's the second time, hold on!

subtitles.original: はい！ 集合、集合、ピース！
subtitles.english: Okay! Gather 'round, gather 'round, peace!

subtitles.original: あー、みんな使い回しがバレたから。
subtitles.english: Ah, everyone saw through the recycled routine.

subtitles.original: 2回目だめだよね、ちょっと。
subtitles.english: Doing it a second time is a bit much.

subtitles.original: しかも、動きおかしくなってたからね。
subtitles.english: Besides, the movements were getting weird.

subtitles.original: ちょ、おかしいってあなたの動きですけど。
subtitles.english: Wait, your movements are the ones that are weird.

subtitles.original: 自分ってこんな動きしてたんだ。気持ち悪いよ！
subtitles.english: I didn't know I moved like that. It's gross!

subtitles.original: いやー、でも本当に、みんな来てくれてありがとう！忙しい中。
subtitles.english: Anyway, thank you all so much for coming despite your busy schedules!

subtitles.original: このメンバー、何で呼ばれたか分かりますか？想像つくかな？
subtitles.english: Do you know why I called this group together? Any guesses?

subtitles.original: 今日ははっぴーライブということで。
subtitles.english: Since today is a 'Happy Live'...

subtitles.original: 本当に一緒に歌いたい、大好きな人を集めたんですけど。
subtitles.english: I gathered people I truly love and wanted to sing with.

subtitles.original: え、好きってこと！？
subtitles.english: What, you love us!?

subtitles.original: え、え、え、え、え、え！！！
subtitles.english: Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait!!!

subtitles.original: そうなの。しかもメドレーでしたら、すごい面白いかなと思って。
subtitles.english: Exactly. And I thought it would be really fun if we did a medley.

subtitles.original: 楽しかった！
subtitles.english: It was fun!

subtitles.original: この5人でちょっと写真撮って。結構圧巻じゃないですか？
subtitles.english: Let's take a photo with the five of us. It's quite a sight, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 何か横にでかいハムスターいるよ。
subtitles.english: There's a huge hamster next to us.

subtitles.original: 大納言さん。
subtitles.english: That's Dainagon-san.

subtitles.original: 大納言さんいいの？映らなくて。
subtitles.english: Is Dainagon-san okay not being in the shot?

subtitles.original: じゃあこっちの大納言と一緒に。
subtitles.english: Then let's take it with this Dainagon.

subtitles.original: じゃあこっちの前に集まる？
subtitles.english: Should we gather in front of this one?

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: こっちの大納言も寂しがってる。
subtitles.english: This Dainagon is lonely too.

subtitles.original: はい、チーズ！
subtitles.english: Say cheese!

subtitles.original: ハムスターじゃないよ。
subtitles.english: It's not a hamster.

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 満足。ありがとうみんな。
subtitles.english: That was great. Thank you, everyone.

subtitles.original: まだまだライブ続くんで。団長頑張りやす！
subtitles.english: The live is still going. Captain Noel will do her best!

subtitles.original: 頑張ってねー！
subtitles.english: Good luck!

subtitles.original: 皆さん良いお年を！
subtitles.english: Happy New Year, everyone!

subtitles.original: 来年は幸せになれますように。
subtitles.english: I hope next year will be a happy one.

subtitles.original: いや、今年も幸せなのよ。
subtitles.english: No, I'm happy this year too.

subtitles.original: 今も幸せだからね。
subtitles.english: I'm happy right now.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございましたー。
subtitles.english: Thank you so much.

subtitles.original: 来年もよろしくねー。
subtitles.english: Looking forward to next year too.

subtitles.original: 頑張る。まだ明けてないよ。
subtitles.english: I'll do my best. The year hasn't ended yet.

subtitles.original: 来年から頑張る。頑張ろう！ イェーイ！
subtitles.english: I'll do my best from next year. Let's go! Yay!

subtitles.original: 消える飛行機雲 僕たちは見送った
subtitles.english: We watched as the vapor trails disappeared

subtitles.original: 眩しくて逃げた
subtitles.english: It was so bright that I ran away
